name: Lonely Turret 2
description:
Lonely Turret 2 is a Turret Defense where you attach weapons to your stationary turret and upgrade it as you defend against waves of various enemies with different abilities and levels. Inspired by other roguelikes, you have to make the best to choose the best upgrades and build your turret to last.
  • 50 Attachments - With 50 unique attachments to put on your turret and upgrade over time, you'll never run out of unique ways to build your turret. Over time you can upgrade these attachments to make them more and more powerful as you turn the screen into your own bullet hell.
  • 3 Special Upgrades - While you might not get the attachments you need, you will always have access to special upgrades like a healing upgrade to recover from damage, a defense upgrade to increase your max health, and a rotation upgrade to spin faster.
  • 10 Enemy Types - With 10 different normal enemies that spawn in different waves, one strategy won't work forever and you have to make use of different attachments to deal with each type of enemy. While you level up, so do they, and the enemies of each level will level up just like your weapons can.
  • 5 Boss Types - Every 250 kills you will have to survive and take down a powerful boss that has the power to kill you in one hit and spawn their own fleets of enemies. Each level has its own type of boss with a twist, as each boss type is unique.
  • 5 Levels - Each level has its own pool of attachments, enemies, and bosses, so even if you manage to beat one level, you have another completely different experience waiting.
  • Endless Mode - Even if you beat a level, you can keep going! How far will you get when enemies and bosses level even higher and spawn faster?
